entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
